name: Star Scandal
summary: As a newbie photojournalist, the glittering world of the rich and famous seems impossibly out of reach, but all that is about to change. Not even one day into your job, you suddenly find yourself rubbing shoulders with the crème de la crème of the celebrity world alongside the very hands-on CEO of your agency. Knowing who is trying to butter you up and who genuinely holds your best interests at heart could be the difference between rising to the top or being savaged in the latest news cycle.
